items.name: Push-up
items.description: Push-ups are a great bodyweight exercise that target the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

items.name: Squat
items.description: Squats are a fundamental lower body exercise that target the quadriceps, hamstrings, and glutes.

items.name: Pull-up
items.description: Pull-ups are an excellent upper body exercise that target the back, biceps, and forearms.
